title: Relation to Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act
context: [ยง425R-13] Relation to Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act. This chapter modifies, limits, and supersedes the federal Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, 15 United States Code section 7001, et seq., but does not modify, limit, or supersede section 101&copy; of that Act, 15 United States Code section 7001&copy;, or authorize delivery of any of the notices described in section 103(b) of that Act, 15 United States Code section 7003(b). [L 2009, c 55, pt of ยง1]
